scripts.build:all: pnpm --filter @bzrr/canvas-table-core run build && pnpm --filter @bzrr/canvas-table-react run build && pnpm --filter canvas-table-demo run build
scripts.lint:all: pnpm --filter @bzrr/canvas-table-core run lint && pnpm --filter @bzrr/canvas-table-react run lint && pnpm --filter canvas-table-demo run lint
scripts.format:all: pnpm --filter @bzrr/canvas-table-core run format && pnpm --filter @bzrr/canvas-table-react run format && pnpm --filter canvas-table-demo run format
